dict.string:
# BEWARE. Errors are suppressed. "${TM_TIDY:-tidy}" -f /dev/null -iq -utf8 -asxhtml --tab-size $TM_TAB_SIZE --indent-spaces $TM_TAB_SIZE|\ if [[ "$TM_SOFT_TABS" == "YES" ]]; then cat; else ruby -pe '
if(!$in_pre) tab_size = ENV["TM_TAB_SIZE"].to_i space, text = $_.match(/( *)(.*)/m)[1..2] $_ = "\t" * (space.length / tab_size).floor + " " * (space.length % tab_size) + text end
$in_pre = true if(/<pre>/) $in_pre = false if(/<\/pre>/) ' fi
